description: Try our easy to follow Savoury Peanut Butter Biscuits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Savoury Peanut Butter Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roll dough out between 2 sheets of baking paper until 4mm thick. Cut 6cm rounds from dough, re-rolling off cuts. Place onto prepared trays and sprinkle with sea salt flakes and pepper. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden and crisp. Transfer to a wire rack to cool. Serve with cheese and assorted fruit if desired.
